name: 1 of a kind drawstring -Yoga/lounge pants
description:
These are super comfortable pants made from re-claimed t-shirts. Soft and cozy, they are perfect for working out, bed time, or that jaunt to trader joes. 
size- waist 28-34
hips-38
inseam-31.5
rise-9
hem/leg open-19
out-seam/total length 40
Ethical, guilt free, non factory made product. one of a kind designed and fabricated by Rico Adair in Los Angeles.

REFUNDS- Not available.

EXCHANGES/STORE CREDIT
All exchanges must be made no longer than 5 business days after receiving your wearable Art.
If you wish to exchange, please allow up to 3 business weeks for production on your new piece.
You will have to cover shipping costs, so an invoice will be sent out to cover that .
(prices for shipping vary depending on the quantity/country). 

***Altered items are not subject to exchanges.***

ALTERATIONS- 
All alterations must be made no longer than 5 business days after receiving your piece.
If you need length and/or width alterations before or after shipping, please be aware that additional charges will have to be made. These additional costs will be paid in full before alterations are completed. We do not cover the return shipping cost  to reship the altered garments.

All altered garment(s) sales are Final and we do not offer exchanges or refunds on these garment(s).

name: Adair patch Screenprinted t-shirt
description:
From time to time Rico is given or comes across lots of unwanted garments or fabric from other designers. Here is a series he did with some them. All art work and fabric manipulation are Rico's original designs. Screen printing ink used is water based. 
Size S

name: Power Ranger-tiedye Tank Dress
description:
This shape is our signature Standard Tank Dress with a crossover front. Each unique dress is made from reclaimed/re purposed materials with a hand printed label. Rico takes careful consideration to the placement of the graphics and color palette. This is a one of a kind piece of art. 
size: M 

because of the variations of consistency of stretch in fabrics, women's bodies and personal fit preferences, size suggestions are as follows:

size S should fit bust size 32” to 38” 

size M should fit bust size 36” to 40” 

Size L should fit bust size 38" to 46" 

Size XL should fit bust size 40" to 48"


If you are in anyway unsure which size would be for you please send me your concerns and measurements.

name: 1998 Venice Art Walk Vulcan Tank Dress
description:
This piece truly is a prime example of the special charm and character that is a Rico Adair garment. Rico was given a small number of 1998 Venice Art walk t- shirts. He did a limited run of items. Included were a couple of tank dresses and shorts. 

This shape is our signature Standard Tank Dress with a Vulcan finish. Each unique dress is made from reclaimed/re purposed materials with a hand printed label. Rico takes careful consideration to the placement of the graphics and color palette. This is a one of a kind piece of art.

name: Reclaimed 100% Cashmere knee length Block Scarf blue and cream
description:
This is my favorite time of year!! Why you ask? because Rico breaks out the cashmere. I ABSOLUTELY LOVE wearing these scarves. They are super soft and cozy and make other people want to snuggle you. Because of his color selection you can turn an otherwise dull and drab outfit into a dynamic ensemble. Consider more than one color way to jazz up your winter wardrobe. custom colors and lengths are available upon request. Make wonderful gifts for mom and other hard to  express how much you love them kind of people. 

size: knee- approx 84" x 6.5
